paymentgateway

Descrição Recurso
Inserir novo Bin PUT /ccbin/newbin
Recuperar Bin pelo seu número GET /ccbin/bins/{number}
Recuperar Bin pelo país GET /ccbin/country/{country}/bins
Recuperar Bin pelo emissor GET /ccbin/issuer/{issuer}/bins
Remover Bin DELETE /ccbin/bins/delete/{number}
Recuperar lista de emissores disponíveis GET /ccbin/issuers
Inserir novo emissor PUT /ccbin/newissuer/{issuer}
Remover emissor DELETE /ccbin/issuers/delete/{issuer}
Recuperar países disponíveis GET /ccbin/countries
Inserir novo país PUT /ccbin/newcountry/{country}
Remover país DELETE /ccbin/countries/delete/{country}
Inserir nova bandeira PUT /ccbin/newbrand/{brand}
Remover um bandeira DELETE /ccbin/brands/delete/{brand}
Recuperar bandeiras disponíveis GET /ccbin/brands
Recuperar tipos de cartão GET /ccbin/cardtypes
Inserir novo tipo de cartão PUT /ccbin/newcardtype/{cardType}
Remover um tipo de cartão DELETE /ccbin/cardtypes/delete/{cardtype}
Recuperar subtipos de cartão GET /ccbin/cardsubtypes
Inserir novo subtipo de cartão PUT /ccbin/newcardsubtype/{cardSubType}
Remover um subtipo de cartão DELETE /ccbin/cardsubtypes/delete/{cardsubtype}
Recuperar produtos de um emissor GET /ccbin/products/{issuer}
Inserir produtos para um emissor PUT /ccbin/newproduct
Remover um produto de um emissor DELETE /ccbin/products/delete/{issuer}/{product}

Inserir novo Bin

PUT /ccbin/newbin

Exemplo

{
  "binNumber": "123456",
  "issuer": "ITAU UNIBANCO S A",
  "brand": "VISA",
  "issuerCountry": "BRA",
  "product": "PERSONALITE",
  "country": "BRA",
  "cardType": "CREDIT",
  "cardSubType": "PLATINUM"
}

Response

Recuperar Bin pelo seu número

GET /ccbin/bins/{number}

Response

Status: `200 OK` 

{
  "binNumber": "123456",
  "issuer": "ITAU UNIBANCO S A",
  "brand": "VISA",
  "issuerCountry": "BRA",
  "product": "PERSONALITE",
  "country": "BRA",
  "cardType": "CREDIT",
  "cardSubType": "PLATINUM"
}

Recuperar Bin pelo país

GET /ccbin/country/{country}/bins

Response

Status: `200 OK` 

{
  "binNumber": "123456",
  "issuer": "ITAU UNIBANCO S A",
  "brand": "VISA",
  "issuerCountry": "BRA",
  "product": "PERSONALITE",
  "country": "BRA",
  "cardType": "CREDIT",
  "cardSubType": "PLATINUM"
}

Recuperar Bin pelo emissor

GET /ccbin/issuer/{issuer}/bins

Response

Status: `200 OK` 

{
  "binNumber": "123456",
  "issuer": "ITAU UNIBANCO S A",
  "brand": "VISA",
  "issuerCountry": "BRA",
  "product": "PERSONALITE",
  "country": "BRA",
  "cardType": "CREDIT",
  "cardSubType": "PLATINUM"
}

Remover Bin

DELETE /ccbin/bins/delete/{number}

Response

Recuperar lista de emissores disponíveis

GET /ccbin/issuers

Response

Status: `200 OK` 

[
  "ITAU UNIBANCO S A",
  "CAIXA ECONOMICA FEDERAL"
]

Inserir novo emissor

PUT /ccbin/newissuer/{issuer}

Response

Remover emissor

DELETE /ccbin/issuers/delete/{issuer}

Response

Recuperar países disponíveis

GET /ccbin/countries

Response

Status: `200 OK` 

[
  "BRA",
  "USA"
]

Inserir novo país

PUT /ccbin/newcountry/{country}

Response

Remover país

DELETE /ccbin/countries/delete/{country}

Response

Inserir nova bandeira

PUT /ccbin/newbrand/{brand}

Response

Remover um bandeira

DELETE /ccbin/brands/delete/{brand}

Response

Recuperar bandeiras disponíveis

GET /ccbin/brands

Response

Status: `200 OK` 

[
  "VISA",
  "MASTERCARD"
]

Recuperar tipos de cartão

GET /ccbin/cardtypes

Response

Status: `200 OK` 

[
  "CREDIT",
  "DEBIT"
]

Inserir novo tipo de cartão

PUT /ccbin/newcardtype/{cardType}

Response

Remover um tipo de cartão

DELETE /ccbin/cardtypes/delete/{cardtype}

Response

Recuperar subtipos de cartão

GET /ccbin/cardsubtypes

Response

Status: `200 OK` 

[
  "PLATINUM",
  "GOLD"
]

Inserir novo subtipo de cartão

PUT /ccbin/newcardsubtype/{cardSubType}

Response

Remover um subtipo de cartão

DELETE /ccbin/cardsubtypes/delete/{cardsubtype}

Response

Recuperar produtos de um emissor

GET /ccbin/products/{issuer}

Response

Status: `200 OK` 

[
  {
    "name": "PERSONALITE",
    "issuer": "ITAU UNIBANCO S A"
  },
  {
    "name": "UNICLASS",
    "issuer": "ITAU UNIBANCO S A"
  }
]

Inserir produtos para um emissor

PUT /ccbin/newproduct

Exemplo

{
  "name": "PERSONALITE",
  "issuer": "ITAU UNIBANCO S A"
}

Response

Remover um produto de um emissor

DELETE /ccbin/products/delete/{issuer}/{product}

Response
